# SQL example

Script:

```
ans <- execute_sql_query(
  query="select `rows`, AVG(a) as avg_a from `tiledb://TileDB-Inc/quickstart_dense` GROUP BY `rows`",
  name="rows-query",
  namespace="yournamespace")
show(ans)

ans <- execute_sql_query(
  query="select `cols`, AVG(a) as avg_a from `tiledb://TileDB-Inc/quickstart_dense` GROUP BY `cols`",
  name="cols-query",
  namespace="yournamespace")
show(ans)

```

Output:

```
    avg_a rows
1  2.5000    1
2  6.5000    2
3 10.5000    3
4 14.5000    4
    avg_a cols
1  7.0000    1
2  8.0000    2
3  9.0000    3
4 10.0000    4
```
